CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dw].[Tipo_Cambio]
WITH
	(LOCATION = 'Synapse/Tipo_Cambio',
    DATA_SOURCE = desarrollo,
    FILE_FORMAT = PARQUET)
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://storageaccdesarrollo.dfs.core.windows.net/filesystemdesarrollo/bplay/Tipo_Cambio/part-00000-b90b69af-c828-453a-89d6-d4b801af0e9d-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
